0.8.name: wordpress/wp-image-tooltip
0.8.description: An easy to use plugin that enables image tooltips on your posts. Just upload an image using post or page editor and insert a link to that image, put the class attribute 'tooltip' and voilá, now you have image tooltips when hovering your link. Thanks to clueTip jQuery plugin makers @ http://plugins.learningjquery.com/cluetip/ =D
